name: committer_id
description: Github id of the *push* committer (someone who has write access to the repo). A committer may push commits from contributor users who do not have write access.

name: committer_login
description: Github login of the *push* committer (someone who has write access to the repo). A committer may push commits from contributor users who do not have write access.

name: org_id
description: Null for user owners, the organization's github id if the owner is an organization

name: contributor_email
description: Contributor (commit author) email as reported in commit (username obfuscated)

name: contributor_name
description: Contributor (commit author) display name (i.e. not necessarily username)
